name: Mushroom: The Ruckus
description: A 2D hack-n-slash type deal - play as a mushroom who seeks approval from a floating eyeball.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 1.6GHz dual core Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: Pretty much anything that can deal with OpenGL ES Storage: 100 MB available space Additional Notes: This game is really light-weight, I'm pretty sure even the above system requirements are overkill.
